title: Festival Janmashtami di Mumbai
description: Devotees pray before forming a human pyramid to break a clay pot containing curd during the Hindu festival of Janmashtami, marking the birth anniversary of Hindu Lord Krishna, in Mumbai, India, August 19, 2022. REUTERS/Francis ...

title: Menkes pastikan ketersediaan alkes 100 persen produksi dalam negeri
description:
